A C D M R S T 

A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class TicTacToeGame
Retrieves the square clicked, matches it with the square in the TicTacToeSquare array, then puts the X or O in the square and checks if a player has won.

C

checkTie() - Method in class TicTacToeGame
Checks to see if the game had ended in a tie.
checkWin(int) - Method in class TicTacToeGame
Finds the row and column of the TicTacToeSquare clicked and checks if a player won.
checkXorO() - Method in class TicTacToeSquare
Determines whether X or O should be displayed on the clicked button based on which player clicked the button.
completesColumn(int) - Method in class TicTacToeGame
Checks for a win in the column of the square the player clicked.
completesMatch(int, int) - Method in class TicTacToeGame
Checks for a win in the row and column of the clicked square, and in the diagonals if applicable.
completesRow(int) - Method in class TicTacToeGame
Checks for a win in the row of the square the player clicked.
completesTopLeftToBottomRight() - Method in class TicTacToeGame
Checks for a win in the top left to bottom right diagonal.
completesTopRightToBottomLeft() - Method in class TicTacToeGame
Checks for a win in the top right to bottom left diagonal.
createButtons() - Method in class TicTacToeGame
Creates a JPanel for TicTacToeSquares, then creates a TicTacToeSquare for every spot on the tic tac toe board, adds an ActionListener, adds every TicTacToeSquare to the panel, and returns the panel.
createTextArea() - Method in class TicTacToeGame
The text area that displays whose turn it is is created.

D

displayInstructions() - Method in class TicTacToeGame
Creates a text area that displays the game's instructions.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class TicTacToeApplication
 
matches(TicTacToeSquare) - Method in class TicTacToeSquare
Check if the passed piece has the same mark as this one.

R

refreshDisplay() - Method in class TicTacToeSquare
Sets the text on the clicked button and makes it unclickable.

S

setPlayerTurn() - Method in class TicTacToeGame
The number of the next player is determined.
start() - Method in class TicTacToeApplet
Special method that will be invoked when applet is created

T

TicTacToeApplet - Class in <Unnamed>
TicTacToeApplet creates a TicTacToe board.
TicTacToeApplet() - Constructor for class TicTacToeApplet
Constructor, invoked for a new instance
TicTacToeApplication - Class in <Unnamed>
TicTacToeApplication creates a TicTacToeGame.
TicTacToeApplication() - Constructor for class TicTacToeApplication
 
TicTacToeGame - Class in <Unnamed>
TicTacToeGame creates the instructions text area, the panel of TicTacToeSquares for the game, and the status bar that displays whose turn is next.
TicTacToeGame(int) - Constructor for class TicTacToeGame
Constructor, creates a panel with buttons for each cell on the tic tac toe board, a text area that displays instructions, and a text area that tells the players whose turn it is.
TicTacToeGame() - Constructor for class TicTacToeGame
Goes to other constructor with the default board setting of 3.
TicTacToeSquare - Class in <Unnamed>
TicTacToeSquare constructs a TicTacToeSquare (shortened to square in some comments), checks if two squares contain the same text, and displays the symbol of the player who clicked a square on that square and disables it from being clicked again.
TicTacToeSquare() - Constructor for class TicTacToeSquare
Constructor for TicTacToeSquares
